title: "Target Markdown"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(targets)
library(tarchetypes)
```

# Model Output

```{r, message = FALSE}
model <- targets::tar_read(linear_model)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
targets::tar_read(data) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
    aes(x = horsepower, y = highwaympg, color = fueltype) + 
    geom_point() + 
    labs(title = "Scatterplot of Highway MPG and Horsepower",
         x = "Horsepower",
         y = "Highway MPG")
```
